lyrics:
Singing Radiohead 
at the top of our lungs
With the boom box blaring
As we're falling in love
Got a bottle of whatever
But it's gettin' us drunk
Singing, here's to never growing up

Call up all of our friends
Go hard this weekend
For no damn reason
I don't think we'll ever change
Meet you at the spot
Half past ten o'clock
We don't ever stop
And we're never gonna change

Say
Won't you say forever stay
If you stay forever, hey
We can stay forever young

Singing Radiohead 
at the top of our lungs
With the boom box blaring
As we're falling in love
Got a bottle of whatever
But it's gettin' us drunk
Singing, here's to never growing up
We'll be running down the street
 yelling kiss my ass
I'm like yeah whatever, 
we're still living like that
When the sun's going down,
we'll be raising our cups
Singing, here's to never growing up
Oh woah, oh woah
Here's to never growing up
Oh woah, oh woah
Here's to never growing up

We live like rock stars
Dance on every bar
This is who we are
I don't think we'll ever change
They say just grow up
But they don't know us
We don't give a fuck
And we're never gonna change

Say
Won't you say forever stay
If you stay forever, hey
We can stay forever young

at the top of our lungs

we'll be raising our cups

Here's to never growing up

Here's to never growing up

We can stay forever young
